Class TwoDimShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • TwoDimShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Paralellogram, Rect, Square, Trapezoid, Triangle

extends Shape
    Second tier class for two-dimensional shapes
